page.title: 02VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: The{village school}in{Little Dewchurch has{30 children, 2 teachers, and 2 {classrooms. }The youngest children are{6 years old, and the oldest are {11. }When they are{11}they go on to{Haywood High School. }The children do not all live in the village; the ones that do{walk to school,}the ones who live out in the country come by {car. }One end of the school is the {old school house}and still has the bell (in a little tower) which used to be rung when school started. There is{one classroom in the old part,}and a{portacabin}on the edge of the playground with the other classroom. There is a{very high fence}around the {playground. }They have the usual lessons, like{English, Maths, History, {Geography, Divinity, Art. }The games they play are{football, rounders, {netball, swimming, and athletics.
